code: import axios from"axios/index";import{api_endpoint}from"settings";export var registerPhoneNumber=function registerPhoneNumber(phoneNum){var phoneNumberData={phone_number:phoneNum};var resp=axios.post(api_endpoint+"/registration_by_phone_number",phoneNumberData).then(function(response){return response.data;});return resp;};export var checkRegistrationSmsCode=function checkRegistrationSmsCode(smsCode){var smsCheckData={user_id:sessionStorage.getItem("user_id"),id_sms_code:sessionStorage.getItem("id_sms_code"),entered_sms_code:smsCode,token:sessionStorage.getItem("token"),key:sessionStorage.getItem("key")};var apiEndpoint="/registration_sms_code_check";var resp=axios.get(api_endpoint+apiEndpoint,{params:smsCheckData}).then(function(response){return response.data;});return resp;};
